ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_SCN: 和海量玩家实时匹配对抗，或者参与排位竞技，无论胜负均可获得大量金币！
ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_FCN: 和海量玩家实时匹配对抗，或者参与排位竞技，无论胜负均可获得大量金币！
ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_EN: Join millions of players in Quick Play or Ranked matches to win Hero Coins matter you win or lose!

ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_SCN: 完成日常任务可以从活跃度宝箱中获得海量金币！
ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_FCN: 完成日常任务可以从活跃度宝箱中获得海量金币！
ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_EN: Win a big amount of Hero Coins by completing daily tasks and obtaining Activity Chests!

ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_SCN: 花费金币、魂石、战魂币可以在商城中购买绝大多数的英雄！
ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_FCN: 花费金币、魂石、战魂币可以在商城中购买绝大多数的英雄！
ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_EN: You can buy most of the Heroes with Hero Coins, Gems, and Tickets in the Shop!

ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_SCN: 知己知彼，百战不败！观看录像了解对手的战术技巧
ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_FCN: 知己知彼，百战不败！观看录像了解对手的战术技巧
ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_EN: Know yourself, know your enemies! View the comprehensive advanced guide!

ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_SCN: 大量视频攻略，带你熟悉各种操作
ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_FCN: 大量视频攻略，带你熟悉各种操作
ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_EN: We offer a myriad of tutorials to walk you through all kinds of tricks and tips.

ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_SCN: 领略各个种族的精彩，享受不同的游戏体验
ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_FCN: 领略各个种族的精彩，享受不同的游戏体验
ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_EN: Explore four races with distinctive traits to enjoy a diverse game experience.

ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_SCN: 免费英雄模拟实战训练，全面的技巧教学让你的操作更加犀利
ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_FCN: 免费英雄模拟实战训练，全面的技巧教学让你的操作更加犀利
ResSystemGrowthGuidanceDesc.Desc_EN: Free Hero trials in Training with plenty of advanced guides. You'll be a pro in no time!
